short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate Bonus Share, Cash Dividend, Profit, Loss and Price Adjustment of Nepal Stocks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart stock calculator that provides different share calculation options for Nepal Share Market. This smart calculator has following options

Bonus Share
Bonus Price Adjustment
Right Share Adjustment
Stock Fair value
EMI
Income Tax
Margin Lending - Share Against Loan
WACC
Stock Details
Stock List
